price: Аллахова је власт и на небесима и на Земљи, а Аллаху се све враћа.
arabic: وَلِلَّهِ مُلۡكُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ وَإِلَى ٱللَّهِ ٱلۡمَصِيرُ

version.title: Serbian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Serbian by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: walillahi mul'ku al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wa-ilā al-lahi al-maṣīru
